description: Grants the user the ability to create a spherical territory called a 'Room' where they can manipulate anything within it like a surgeon, including cutting, switching, and shambling objects and people.

users.circumstances: Law ate the fruit as a child under unknown circumstances

abilityReveals.description: Law demonstrates the ability to cut through advanced Armament Haki and slice through massive structures including an entire island section.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Law uses his Room ability combined with his sword and Haki to bisect Vergo through his full-body Armament Haki, along with the SAD chamber and part of Punk Hazard island.

weaknesses.description: When Law's heart is removed from his body, his strength and abilities are severely weakened, making him vulnerable to attacks.

strengths.description: Law's combination of Room ability, swordsmanship, and his own Haki allows him to cut through even full-body Armament Haki.

description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into various types of gas. The user can manipulate different gases including poisonous and explosive varieties.

users.circumstances: Caesar Clown ate the Gas-Gas Fruit at some point before his appearance on Punk Hazard

abilityReveals.description: Caesar shoots a beam of lit gas from his mouth that explodes on impact with temperatures hot enough to melt steel.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caesar uses Gastille to attack Luffy during their battle, though Luffy dodges the attack.

description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into smoke. The user can use smoke for offensive attacks, flight, and intangibility.

users.circumstances: Smoker ate the Smoke-Smoke Fruit at some point before becoming a Marine

abilityReveals.description: Smoker uses his smoke abilities to create a smokescreen that allows him to secretly retrieve Law's heart from Vergo while appearing to fight.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Smoker spreads himself out to create a smokescreen, pretending to fight Vergo while actually stealing Law's heart to return it to him.
